      • setup

        public void setup(java.lang.String nStandardCars,
                  java.lang.String nBerlinCars,
                  java.lang.String nVanCars,
                  java.lang.String nCustomers)
        Initialize myUber system.
        Parameters:
        nStandardCars - The number of Standard car in the initialized myUber system.
        nBerlinCars - The number of Berline car in the initialized myUber system.
        nVanCars - The number of van car in the initialized myUber system.
        nCustomers - The number of customer in the initialized myUber system.

      • displayState

        public void displayState()
        * display summary information of the current state of the system, including the list of cars (with their position), the list of drivers (with their status, their statistics, etc), the list of customers (with their position, their statistics, etc). output: the list of car the list of drivers the list of customers (with their relevant information).

      • displayState

        public void displayState(java.io.BufferedWriter bw)
        display summary information of the current state of the system, including the list of cars (with their position), the list of drivers (with their status, their statistics, etc), the list of customers (with their position, their statistics, etc). output: the list of car the list of drivers the list of customers (with their relevant information). Finally we write down the result in a TXT.

      • moveCar

        public void moveCar(java.lang.String carID,
                    java.lang.String xPos,
                    java.lang.String yPos)
        We use this method to change a car's current situation.
        Parameters:
        carID - The car ID in String, like"Standard1"
        xPos - The longitude coordinate that we want to set the car to.
        yPos - The latitude coordinate that we want set the car to.

        yPos - The latitude coordinate that we want set the car to.

      • ask4price

        public void ask4price(java.lang.String custID,
                      java.lang.String xPos,
                      java.lang.String yPos,
                      java.lang.String time)
        Method to return a list of prices matching 4 kinds of ride.
        Parameters:
        custID - Id of the customer who wants to ask for a new ride.
        xPos - Destination longitude coordination.
        yPos - Destination latitude coordination.
        time - The start hour of this asked ride. We use 0-23 as input number. If time < 0, it means regarding system time as ride beginning time.

      • ask4price

        public void ask4price(java.lang.String custID,

        time -
        bw -

      • displayDrivers

        public void displayDrivers(java.lang.String sortpolicy)
        Method to sort and display all drivers according to a specific policy.
        Parameters:
        sortpolicy - There are two choices for the "sortpolicy". If sortpolicy = "mostappreciated", we use average mark to sort our drivers, if sortpolicy = "mostoccupied", we use occupied-ratio to sort them.

      • displayDrivers

        public void displayDrivers(java.lang.String sortpolicy,
                           java.io.BufferedWriter bw)
        Method to sort and display all drivers according to a specific policy and write down the result.
        Parameters:
        sortpolicy -
        bw -

      • displayCustomers

        public void displayCustomers(java.lang.String sortpolicy)
        Method to sort and display all customers according to a specific policy.
        Parameters:
        sortpolicy - There are two choices for the "sortpolicy". If sortpolicy = "mostfrequent", we use total amount of rides each customer has taken to sort, if sortpolicy = "mostcharged", we use the total amount of money each customer has spent in our system to sort.

      • displayCustomers

        public void displayCustomers(java.lang.String sortpolicy,
                             java.io.BufferedWriter bw)
        Method to sort and display all customers according to a specific policy and write down the result.
        Parameters:
        sortpolicy -
        bw -

      • simRide

        public void simRide(java.lang.String customerID,
                    java.lang.String passengerNum,
                    java.lang.String xPos,
                    java.lang.String yPos,
                    java.lang.String timeHH,
                    java.lang.String timeMM,
                    java.lang.String rideType,
                    java.lang.String driverMark)
        Method to execute a ride automatically, and print out the state of ride.
        Parameters:
        customerID - To indicate the customer who wants to do this order.
        passengerNum - To indicate the number of passengers for this new ride.
        xPos - The longitude coordinate of ride destination.
        yPos - The latitude coordinate of ride destination.
        timeHH - Ride beginning hour.
        timeMM - Ride beginning minute.
        rideType - Ride type. Choices: "uberx", "uberblack", "ubervan", "uberpool".
        driverMark - Customer's evaluation for this ride(driver). From 1 to 5.

      • simRide
